creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons, in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: Discontinuous supplementary weft patterning; broad red bands on each side, white central area decorated with birds, double-headed eagles and geometric motifs with a row of horizontal double chevrons in the center. Patterning is woven in red, yellow, orange, red purple, light blue, dark blue, green.
title: Woman's blouse (Huipil)
